title: Australian diary. No. 026
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: a play centre/nursery school opens in Canberra; Norris E. Dodd, United Nations Director of Food, outlines the world food position; overseas telecommunications are featured and a closer look at Broken Hill is shown.
